Text: Brilliant!!!,.. THE seminal live performance the of the competitive pipe band as it stands & competes today Still a bench mark 20 yrs on after it was produced live! Good copy (no Cover?)
sorry, cover went out with the jewel case many years ago. I remember it as fairly cheap 2 side cover with copyright info, but no real detail about the band or the recording.
I actually found the cover, so give me a couple of days to either rig up a scanner or run this through one at work. Also I am considering maybe ripping this again in an open format like ogg.
